        var duration = 1000;
        var height = 50;
        var width = 1000;
        var svg_width = d3.max(movie_data.map(d => d.box_offices)) + 100;

        var years = new Set(movie_data.map(d => d.year));

        // set up svg
        var svg = d3.select("body")
          .append("svg")
          .attr("width", svg_width)
          .attr("height", "1000");

        var n = 10; // number of movies to display

        // to rank the data by box office
        function rank(data) {
          data.sort((a, b) => d3.descending(a.box_offices, b.box_offices));
          for (let i = 0; i < data.length; ++i) {
              data[i].rank = Math.min(n, i);}
          return data;
        }


        function setColor(data){
            if (data.genre === "genre1"){
            return "lightblue"
          }else{
            return "lightgray"
            }
          }



        function update(data) {

          var yScale = d3.scaleLinear()
                          .domain([0, d3.max(data.map(d => d.box_offices))])
                          .range([0, 900])
          var yAxis = d3.axisTop().scale(yScale);

          var bar = svg.selectAll("rect").data(data);
          bar.enter()
          .append("rect")
            .attr("x",0)
            .attr("y", d => d.rank * height)
            .attr("height", height)
            .attr("stroke","white")
            .attr("stroke-width",10)
          .merge(bar)
            .transition()
            .duration(duration)
            .attr("width", d => yScale(d.box_offices))
            .attr("fill", d => setColor(d));

          bar.exit()
           .transition()
           .duration(duration)
           .attr("width", 0)
           .remove();


          var texts = svg.selectAll("text").data(data);
          texts.enter()
            .append("text")
            .attr("font-size", "20px")
            .attr("font-weight", "bold")
            .attr("y", d => d.rank*height+0.6*height)
            .attr("x", -100)
            .merge(texts)
            .text(d => d.name)
            .transition()
            .duration(duration)
            .attr("x", d => yScale(d.box_offices))
            .attr("fill", "black");
          texts.exit()
            .transition()
            .duration(duration)
            .attr("x", -100)
            .remove();

        }

        d3.selectAll("button")
        .on("click", function (d) {
          var selected_year = d3.select(this).attr("type");
          if (selected_year == "1930-1940") {
            var dat = movie_data.filter(d => d.year <= 1940 && d.year > 1930);
            update(rank(dat.slice(0,10)));
          } else if (selected_year == "1940-1950"){
            var dat = movie_data.filter(d => d.year <= 1950 && d.year > 1940);
            update(rank(dat.slice(0,10)));
          } else if (selected_year == "1950-1960") {
            var dat = movie_data.filter(d => d.year <= 1960 && d.year > 1950);
            update(rank(dat.slice(0,10)));
          } else if (selected_year == "1960-1970") {
            var dat = movie_data.filter(d => d.year <= 1970 && d.year > 1960);
            update(rank(dat.slice(0,10)));
          } else if (selected_year == "1970-1980"){
            var dat = movie_data.filter(d => d.year <= 1980 && d.year > 1970);
            update(rank(dat.slice(0,10)));
          } else if (selected_year == "1980-1990"){
            var dat = movie_data.filter(d => d.year <= 1990 && d.year > 1980);
            update(rank(dat.slice(0,10)));
          } else if (selected_year == "1990-2000"){
            var dat = movie_data.filter(d => d.year <= 2000 && d.year > 1990);
            update(rank(dat.slice(0,10)));
          } else if (selected_year == "2000-2010") {
            var dat = movie_data.filter(d => d.year <= 2010 && d.year > 2000);
            update(rank(dat.slice(0,10)));
          } else if (selected_year == "2010-2020") {
            var dat = movie_data.filter(d => d.year <= 2020 && d.year > 2010);
            update(rank(dat.slice(0,10)));
          } else if (selected_year == "cum") {
            var dat = movie_data;
            update(rank(dat.slice(0,10)));
          };
        });
